snippet: Workers at one of the Colorado emergency rooms where many victims of a mass shooting arrived look back with pride at their performance and horror at the event.
abstract: Members of the medical staff at the University of Colorado Hospital, one of the emergency rooms that treated victims of the Aurora shooting, look back with pride at their performance and horror at the event.
lead_paragraph: Workers at one of the Colorado emergency rooms where many victims of a mass shooting arrived look back with pride at their performance and horror at the event.

headline.seo: Colorado Mass Shooting Tested an E.R. Staff
headline.main: The Night the E.R. Staff Can Never Forget
headline.print_headline: The Night the E.R. Staff Can Never Forget
